radiographic_examinations.findings: Mildly increased lung volumes, bilateral perihilar interstitial opacities, and peribronchial cuffing.
Bilateral, symmetric paramedias -ntal ground-glass opacities, scattered regions of air trapping, areas of atelectasis in dependent portions of the lungs, and a few small parenchymal nodules.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Chest radiographs taken 2 weeks later showed hyperinflated lungs and increasing perihilar patchy opacities in the right lung.
